meanings.definition: A group of people who write a script together.
meanings.sent1: In our class, we are coscripts for the school play.
meanings.sent2: The coscripts collaborated on the screenplay for the movie.
meanings.sent3: The coscripts had so much fun brainstorming ideas for the story.
meanings.sent4: The coscripts' unity in writing the script was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: Working as coscripts made the writing process enjoyable and efficient.

meanings.definition: A group of people who act in a play together.
meanings.sent1: The coscripts rehearsed their lines diligently for the performance.
meanings.sent2: During the play, the coscripts displayed great chemistry on stage.
meanings.sent3: The coscripts' comedic timing brought laughter to the audience.
meanings.sent4: The coscripts' performance was a symphony of talent and dedication.
meanings.sent5: Being coscripts allowed them to showcase their acting skills and teamwork.
